description: A lipoma is a benign tumor composed of fat cells. It is one of the most common benign tumors found in the body.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Whether the lipoma is present or absent.

values.name: Present
values.description: The lipoma is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: The lipoma is absent.

values.name: Stable
values.description: The lipoma is stable.

values.name: New
values.description: The lipoma is new.

values.name: Increased
values.description: The lipoma has increased in size.

values.name: Decreased
values.description: The lipoma has decreased in size.

values.name: Lung: Right Upper Lobe
values.description: The lipoma is located in the right upper lobe of the lung.

values.name: Lung: Right Middle Lobe
values.description: The lipoma is located in the right middle lobe of the lung.

values.name: Lung: Right Lower Lobe
values.description: The lipoma is located in the right lower lobe of the lung.

values.name: Lung: Left Upper Lobe
values.description: The lipoma is located in the left upper lobe of the lung.

values.name: Lung: Left Lower Lobe
values.description: The lipoma is located in the left lower lobe of the lung.

values.name: Mediastinum: Anterior
values.description: The lipoma is located in the anterior mediastinum.

values.name: Mediastinum: Middle
values.description: The lipoma is located in the middle mediastinum.

values.name: Mediastinum: Posterior
values.description: The lipoma is located in the posterior mediastinum.

values.name: Chest Wall
values.description: The lipoma is located in the chest wall.

values.name: Other
values.description: The lipoma is located in another area (Specify).

values.name: Small (<1cm)
values.description: The lipoma is small, less than 1cm in size.

values.name: Medium (1-3cm)
values.description: The lipoma is medium-sized, between 1cm and 3cm in size.

values.name: Large (>3cm)
values.description: The lipoma is large, greater than 3cm in size.

values.name: Round
values.description: The lipoma has a round shape.

values.name: Oval
values.description: The lipoma has an oval shape.

values.name: Irregular
values.description: The lipoma has an irregular shape.

values.name: Well-defined
values.description: The lipoma has a well-defined margin.

values.name: Poorly defined
values.description: The lipoma has a poorly defined margin.

values.name: Low (Fat-density)
values.description: The lipoma has a low density, similar to fat.

values.name: Mixed
values.description: The lipoma has a mixed density.

values.name: High
values.description: The lipoma has a high density.

attributes.name: Other Masses
attributes.description: Whether there are other masses associated with the lipoma.

values.name: Present
values.description: There are other masses present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There are no other masses present.

attributes.name: Calcifications
attributes.description: Whether there are calcifications associated with the lipoma.

values.name: Present
values.description: There are calcifications present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There are no calcifications present.

attributes.name: Signs of Infiltration
attributes.description: Whether there are signs of infiltration associated with the lipoma.

values.name: Present
values.description: There are signs of infiltration present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There are no signs of infiltration present.

attributes.name: Lymphadenopathy
attributes.description: Whether there is lymphadenopathy associated with the lipoma.

values.name: Present
values.description: There is lymphadenopathy present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There is no lymphadenopathy present.
